column2: By comparing the SSR profiles of this cultivar with the profiles of its two parents, `Boskoop' and `Filippa', we concluded that the maternal parent, `Boskoop', had contributed an unreduced triploid egg cell while' Filippa' had contributed a normal, haploid pollen. Gianfranceschi, L., Seglias, N., Tarchini, R. et al. 1998.
